Dear Mr. Oliver*
I m very happy to inform you officially that the Board of Directors of
NAEB has approved your application for active Membership in our association.
You will now be receiving regularly from us the Monthly MSB Haws-Ietter*
additional publications of interest, and many other things. You are also
immediately eligible for the KARi Tape lletwork service, as you know. You
should, of course, feel free to write to this office at any time for any information
concerning educational broadcasting.
Under separate
we are sending you a copy of the NASB Radia^Television,
we hope you will find helpful.
Perhaps the greatest good of an NASS membership is the associations you
form. It’s good to know that others are having the same problems you are
and how they are solving them. It ha® been the tradition with NARB to
exchange this sort of information on a frierai-to-friend basis. You1!! find
lots of friends in flAEB.
